<br />

I welcome applications from students interested in joining the Department of Environmental Sciences [Masters program](http://envs.emory.edu/home/graduate/index.html).  Students with interests in:

* Agricultural adaptation to climate change,
* Geospatial data science,
* Agroecology,
* Water and food security or
* Landscape ecology

can contact me at [emily.burchfield@emory.edu](mailto:emily.burchfield@emory.edu). Please include a brief description of your research interests, your CV, unofficial transcripts, and GRE scores.  Prior experience in GIS, programming, and statistics is strongly recommended.  Prospective students can find more information about the application process on the [Department of Environmental Sciences website.](http://envs.emory.edu/home/graduate/index.html)

More information on a post-doctoral position in the BURCH-lab coming in September 2019!
